Half Life è uno dei più bei giochi a cui abbia mai giocato... graficamente non può reggere il confronto con i prodotti attualmente disponibili sul mercato, ma come trama non ha nulla da invidiare (e anzi ha tanto da insegnare). Una volta finita la saga, ci sarà un'unica cosa a darvi fastidio, l'assenza di news riguardanti il prossimo capitolo: Half Life 3.
E' inutile dire che consiglio vivamente a tutti di giocarlo come si deve, ovvero dall'inizio alla fine, godendo di ogni momento passato in compagnia di Gordon... a tal proposito comprate uno dei pacchetti di valve per avere tutti gli hl e i portal (magari scaricate black mesa e iniziate da lì, visto che hl1 potrebbe risultare un po' troppo retrò).
Il mio consiglio? Riscaldatevi con qualche saltello in Aperture Science, in compagnia di GLaDOS, prima di catapultarvi su Black Mesa...
Voto 10+

An amazing story of... umm.... well as of now i'm not very familiar with the Half-Life series. I have just reciently played this game and gotten used to the environment and gameplay. Just of now I have really enjoyed this game so far. Other than the story to be kind of hard to follow at times because you get stuck a lot, when you do progress, you feel a sense of accomplishment. This game is unique for its weapons, damage system, and statistics to be different from other games as far as I know of. Half-Life 2 is origonal on its own, and is defidentally not copied or stolen from other games and/or gaming companies.

I played this game for the first time recently, really doesn't show it's age it was that far ahead of it's time on release, solid gameplay throughout, alternating between run and gun, physics puzzles, and vehicle sections. character development is unprecidented in gaming, even modern titles like Bioshock Infinite or LA Noir that focus on character realism don't compare with the sheer humanity of the main characters expressed through fantastic voice acting, dynamic animation and expressive motion capture. HL2 is the first chapter of a series of episodes that becomes one of the most compelling sci-fi stories ever told. 

Those sitting on the fence on playing this, do it, there are a couple of corners of the game where you might get stuck furstrated (a vent behind a table in the corner you need to find to progress) pop up youtube, find a walk-through and keep pushing through, the story and gameplay of later levels justifies ploughing through at any cost.

NOTA: 10/10

El mejor FPS de la decáda de 2000. Si el primer Half-Life fue una completa revolución, este segundo también impresionó en su momento. Los principales aciertos del juego fueron su lograda historia, ambientación y narrativa, junto al grandisimo uso de las fisicas y la manipulación de objetos, hasta el punto de haber logrado una maravilla como el arma gravitatoria. Quizas se le puedan sacar algunas pegas como el hecho de que fases como la de la lancha o el coche se hacen demasiado largas y aburridas, pero desde la fase de las hormigas león hasta el final es sencillamente PERFECTO, destacando esa gran fase que es "Seguid a Freeman". Una maravilla.

This game is must play for anyone.

Absolutely fantastic game from start to finish. Fantastic atmosphere, great level design, interesting story, good variety of weapons, and quite frankly some of the best pacing I've ever seen in a game. The fact that you're not force-fed exposition via cutscenes is also a nice addition, as it ensures that you are always in control. Of course, I expect nothing less than excellent game design from Valve.
Also nice is how reasonable the sys. reqs. are, so pretty much any computer, from high-end desktops to laptops with integrated graphics, can run this game smoothly.
Overall, I whole-heartedly recommend Half-Life 2. You can get it for, what, $10 these days? There's no reason not to get this classic.

It is very outstanding game. While it formula is maybe as traditional fps it is really unique within this genre. I like how it is balanced. It has some fast action sections and slow puzzles or sneeking places, so it really lets you relax after some heavy shootouts. And the story is very interesting, it very well crafted and really original. That is the main thong that I like about this game. Its originality and unexpected moments. Also it is really nice that the story is not explained to you , you just appear in the world and have to figure everything by yourself. I highly recomend this to everyone who wants something fresh and distinctive (although I gues by now everyoe have played it :)).

Not even sure how to start writing a review for Half-Life 2. I'd almost be tempted to just say this: If you are in any way the slightest bit interested in FPS games you owe it to yourself to play this game. 

Even if you are not interested in FPS as a genre you owe it to yourself to complete this masterpiece at least once. Does it have the concepts of modern shooters? No. There's no grand cinematic scenes to rival a Hollywood blockbuster; no aim down sight; no realistically modelled weapons with upgrades; no xp, unlocking or levelling up system.

What it does have is almost genre defining. It boasts a well crafted world, a story that grips and propels you through its magnificent atmosphere and a protagonist you can't help but like and admire - a pretty strong feat considering that the man whose shoes you fill never utters a single word.

It's one of those classics that will stand the test of time. Even if you never play it again after your first playthrough it will have been worth it. Trust me - I've completed it at least once a year since it was released and I still have no reason not to.

Это лучший симулятор жизни очкарика, где Вам на собственной шкуре предстоит узнать, что такое быть физиком-ботаном, который зажат на столько, что не может найти общий язык с окружающими, поэтому предпочитает молчать. Вы узнаете, что такое быть девственником, когда тебе далеко за 30, но при этом оставаться лучшим другом для девушки Аликс, которая будет динамить Вас на протяжении всей игры, включая первый и второй эпизод. Каково это - одеваться не по моде в оранжевый комбинезон и жить во дворе с ребятами, которые тебя недолюбливают? Выход один - бежать из Сити 17. На встречу приключениям!

Okay after seriously replaying this game my review has changed.  The graphics are pretty decent.  I personally wasn't drawn into the world but that's just me.  One thing I cannot stand is how often people are like....GORDON FREEMAN!!!  Jeez...why don't they just call me JESUS or MESSIAH!!!  I get so sick of that.  Also the story doesn't do much for me, I can't stand most of the dialogue.  Especially when I know we are pressed for time but people keep YAMMERING on...it's like if a bomb was about go off yet people are giving exposition.  What I did like was all the physics, made for some pretty hilarious fights.  Overall I prefer games like Doom, Doom 2, Blood, Halo and Halo 2, Hexen, Heretic, Quake(s), Unreal(s) etc over this.  Not my fav and doesn't hold much replay value for me but a good game nonetheless.  Check it out.  Also I'm a minority on my opinion so most likely you'll LOVE this game.
